# Puber Changelog

## [0.1.1] - 2025-12-09

### Added
- `name.py` with extended support for the RU-EXTREMELY-CASES group
  (rare and complex Russian name patterns) [181856b].
- Test suite covering the RU-EXTREMELY-CASES group [c97706e].

## [0.1.0] - 2025-12-07

### Added
- Initial public release.
- CLI tool `puber` with name normalization command.
- `norm_name` function for Russian and English personal names.
- Support for initials, inverted names, hyphenated surnames, and case normalization.
- Test suite for name normalization.
